record.field: for record in self: record['x_company_partner_id'] = record.partner_id == record.company_id.partner_id
main_company = self.env.ref('base.main_company') selected_company = self.env.companies.ids for record in self: record['x_is_main_company'] = (main_company.id in selected_company)
for record in self: record['x_studio_attending_owners'] = len([a for a in record.attendee_ids if a.x_studio_attending or a.x_studio_delegating])
for record in self: record['x_studio_is_a_unit'] = record.parent_id != False
for record in self: record['x_share_total'] = sum(line.x_share for line in record.x_line_ids)
